Style: Latino, Afro-Cuban

Executive produced by Wim Wenders (Buena Vista Social Club), Musica Cubana discovers new musical legends that draw on Cuban traditions and popular world music movements. Filmed in a dramatic documentary style, the feature follows a Havana taxi driver and the legendary performer Pio Leyva as they assemble a band of CubaÃƒÂ¢??s best and brightest musicians, rappers, dancers, trumpet players, drummers and more. At the end, the audience witnesses a multi-generational concert at top volume in a theater with room to shake.
